title: FullStack QA Lead/Test Architect
seoDescription: Take the FullStack QA Test Architect assessment. Demonstrate expertise in test architecture, automation frameworks, CI/CD, AI skills, debugging, and leadership. AI-proctored, 30 questions, 40 minutes.
description: Demonstrate your comprehensive expertise across automation frameworks, test architecture, CI/CD, AI Skills, Debugging, and team leadership through our advanced AI-proctored assessment.
